name: [InDev] Before the Storm: A Dog Story
name_original: [InDev] Before the Storm: A Dog Story
description:
Before the Storm: A Dog Story is a stealth-simulation game prototype in which a stray dog searched the streets for food during the night before a typhoon hit in Asia. She brought food back and forth surrounded by potential dangers.

Control

WASD/L Joystick - Move

Mouse/R Joystick - View

E/(A) – Interact

Q/(B) – Drop

F/(X) – Eat

Credits

Design & Code - Tino Hu

Art - Tino Hu, Synty Studio (3D Env)

Note

This is a indie game prototype that still needs a lot of work. The build has a high-level PC requirement due to the lack of optimization at this stage.
